title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: There is an issue with the accessibility of the application. In order to activate the functionality, the user needs to first click on one of the 'live' areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the navigation frame, or the content frame.
OB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000, the tab key does not perform any action.
EB: The expected behavior after launching the Help view on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000, is that the tab key should allow navigation within the view.
SR: It is expected that when launching the Help view with the tab key on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000, the view should respond to the tab key input by allowing navigation within the view.
